text: Mikhail Orlov may refer to: * Mikhail Fyodorovich Orlov (1788–1842), Russian General-major and Decembrist * Mikhail Orlov (racewalker) (born 1967), Russian race walker * Mikhail Orlov (diplomat), Ambassador of the Soviet Union to Seychelles, 1981–1987 * Glenn Michael Souther, American defector to the Soviet Union who changed his name to Mikhail Yevgenyevich Orlov
title: Mikhail Orlov
